name: Wife's derailment / 妻子的出轨
description:
Your wife, Yuru, is a daughter of rich family . She has received a good education since childhood. She is kind and beautiful. But you're just a common person who's having trouble finding a job.
Her father disapproved of your marriage, so she fled with you to a new town.
But men in the small town are not honest people. Neighbors (yellow hair ), who are fitness coaches, and bossy president , are not kind to your wife.

The game offers different stories from different branches, and more updates will follow.
You will play husband or wife in different circumstances, facing different choices, would you like your wife to wear sexy clothes in public? Are you excited to see other men talking to your wife? Your choice will affect the development of the plot.

If you want to know what happen when other men take out your wife , give it a try.

Game feature:
Multiple endings
Operation of male and female role
Multiple Female Characters with Different Characteristics
Various NTR events
Novel choice
